product_name: AlpineAire Texas BBQ Chicken with Beans - 2 Servings
long_description: AlpineAire Texas BBQ Chicken with Beans freeze-dried meal includes hickory-smoked barbecue sauce mixed with white chicken meat and rice. To prepare, add 2 cups of boiling water to the pouch, stir well and close pouch; let stand for 10 - 12 min. and enjoy. Makes two 1 cup servings. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: AlpineAire Texas BBQ Chicken with Beans freeze-dried meal includes hickory-smoked barbecue sauce mixed with white chicken meat and rice.
